dict.string:
# Getting Started # 1. Type 'tw setup' # You will be asked to authenticate with Twitter. # You'll be given a pin number, copy it. # 2. Type 'tw pin <your pin number>' # You'll be authenticated to Twitter. # Done. # # Type 'tw help' for a list of commands.
TW=$(php -f script.php -- "{query}"); echo $TW;
Send tweets, DMs, follow users, etc all via Alfred.
